name: Goro's 3D: Harvest Time
description:
"Goro's 3D: Harvest Time" is a short arcade-style minigame where you have to help Goro the mole to collect all the beets on the farm.

Use the arrows and avoid the dangerous mushrooms to get the highest score.

This game is just a prototype that I created to practice with Godot 3D. It will probably receive updates and improvements someday.
-Korppi
